remarks: A weak version of ~ rabab not using ~ df-clel nor ~ df-v (but requiring ~ ax-ext ).  A version without dv condition is provable by replacing ~ bj-vexwv with ~ bj-vexw in the proof, hence requiring ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-rababwv.1 $e |- ps $.
bj-rababwv $p |- { x e. { y | ps } | ph } = { x | ph } $.
$d x y $.
